scripts.f: forever start  --append -l forever.log -o out.log -e err.log autoblog/index.js
scripts.d: rm -rf public/* && cp robots.txt public/robots.txt &&  cp CNAME public/CNAME && cp googledd7ba3bd3c220ab3.html public/googledd7ba3bd3c220ab3.html && cp MP_verify_fdnVlwV4XvwRqAtj.txt public/MP_verify_fdnVlwV4XvwRqAtj.txt && hexo g -d
scripts.pull: git fetch --all && git reset --hard origin/master && git pull
